participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Pragmatic and down-to-earth, George enjoys the simplicity of life and finds joy in nature.
participant_1.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i'm close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i am a bee farmer.

participant_2.name: Mia
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and passionate, Mia has a creative spirit and a strong desire to succeed in her musical career.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.

content.text: i am not a very good person . i work as a farmer
